price: Kulumuz Eyyub’u da an. Hani Rabbine: “Şeytan bana bir yorgunluk ve azap verdi" diye seslenmişti.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ عَبۡدَنَآ أَيُّوبَ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ بِنُصۡبٖ وَعَذَابٍ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur ʿabdanā ayyūba idh nādā rabbahu annī massaniya al-shayṭānu binuṣ'bin waʿadhābin
